mapper.insert: insert into ton_kho(sys_id_ton_kho, sys_id_san_pham, ma_kho, ma_lo, so_luong, ngay_cap_nhat) values (#{sysIdTonKho}, #{sysIdSanPham}, #{maKho}, #{maLo}, #{soLuong}, #{ngayCapNhat})
mapper.select: SELECT sys_id_ton_kho, sp.sys_id_san_pham, sp.ten_san_pham, ma_kho, ma_lo, so_luong, ngay_cap_nhat FROM ton_kho JOIN san_pham sp on ton_kho.sys_id_san_pham = sp.sys_id_san_pham WHERE sp.sys_id_san_pham = #{sysIdSanPham} AND so_luong > 0 ORDER BY ngay_cap_nhat ASC

SELECT t.sys_id_ton_kho, t.sys_id_san_pham, t.ma_kho, t.ma_lo, t.so_luong, t.ngay_cap_nhat, l.han_su_dung, sp.ten_san_pham, CASE WHEN l.han_su_dung BETWEEN NOW() AND DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) THEN true ELSE false END AS is_near_expiry FROM ton_kho t JOIN lo_hang l ON t.ma_lo = l.ma_lo AND t.sys_id_san_pham = l.sys_id_san_pham join san_pham sp on t.sys_id_san_pham = sp.sys_id_san_pham WHERE l.han_su_dung IS NOT NULL;

SELECT t.sys_id_ton_kho, t.sys_id_san_pham, s.ten_san_pham, t.ma_kho, t.ma_lo, t.so_luong, t.ngay_cap_nhat FROM ton_kho t JOIN san_pham s ON t.sys_id_san_pham = s.sys_id_san_pham WHERE t.sys_id_ton_kho = #{sysIdTonKho}
